oai_dc:dc.dc:title: THE MODELLING OF SHORT WAVES IN SHALLOW WATERS COMPARISON OF NUMERICAL MODELS BASED ON BOUSSINESQ AND SERRE EQUATIONS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Brocchini, M.
Drago, M.
Iovenitti, L.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Boussinesq equation
Serre equation
short waves
shallow water
numerical model
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Two different flow models of the surf zone wave-current dynamics based on Boussinesq and Serre equations have been implemented and tested. Good results were obtained while testing the models against many diffent wave and current data sets. A preliminary calibration was tried but further activities are required to define the proper parameters.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Coastal Engineering Proceedings; No. 23 (1992): Proceedings of 23rd Conference on Coastal Engineering, Venice, Italy, 1992.
